user.title: Todo Magic
user.description: Set up Todo Magic to enhance your todo lists with automatic date parsing, sorting, and more.

abort.single_instance_allowed: Only a single configuration of Todo Magic is allowed.

init.title: Todo Magic Settings
init.description: Configure Todo Magic features for your {todo_count} todo lists. Select which lists should have each feature enabled.

data_description.auto_due_parsing_entities: Todo lists that should automatically extract dates from task text and set due dates
data_description.auto_sort_entities: Todo lists that should automatically sort tasks by due date and priority
data_description.process_recurring_entities: Todo lists that should handle recurring tasks (e.g., [daily], [weekly])
data_description.auto_clear_entities: Todo lists that should automatically clear completed tasks (you'll configure days for each list in the next step)

auto_clear_config.title: Auto-Clear Configuration
auto_clear_config.description: Set the number of days after which completed tasks are cleared for each selected todo list. Use -1 to disable, 0 for immediate clearing, or 1+ for the number of days to wait.

error.no_todo_entities: No todo entities found in your Home Assistant instance.
